snippet: After the prosecution offered grisly images into evidence, the defense lawyer for Officer Gilberto Valle argued to the judge that the government had failed to prove the officer’s guilt.
abstract: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan rest their case in trial of Gilberto Valle, New York City police officer accused of plotting to kidnap, kill and cannibalize women.
lead_paragraph: After the prosecution offered grisly images into evidence, the defense lawyer for Officer Gilberto Valle argued to the judge that the government had failed to prove the officer’s guilt.

headline.seo: Prosecution Rests in Cannibalism Case; Defense Asks for Officer’s Acquittal
headline.main: Prosecution Rests in Cannibalism Case; Defense Asks for Officer’s Acquittal
headline.print_headline: Officer’s Cannibalism Trial Enters the Defense Phase
